item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

Last night was really fun everyone.  I hope you enjoyed it as much as I did.  What a great bunch of singers we have.  Looking forward to March!

I am pleased to announce the March Boston Karaoke Meetup for 2012.  We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM so please try to get there by 6PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

If you have a guest and would like that person to have a cool NameTag, just have him/her register on the site and RSVP directly.

I expect the the next Karaoke Meetup to be well attended.  To make sure you have  a spot, sign up early.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - March 2012
